trends: There has been one other sighting in Hereford
There were no other sightings in Hereford on or around August 8th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailshi there, attached is a photo i took on the 8th august in hay on wye, powys, wales at 2:46pm. i wondered if you may have the means to explain what the white object seen, centre top of the frame is. i didn't see anything at the time and have a photo of the same space but a little out of focus with nothing in the sky i took within 30 seconds previously though the object has no motion blur at a relatively slow shutter speed of 125th of a second. the photo was taken with a nikon d70 and a nikon 70 \ 210 lens. the sky's where clear and visibility good.
